name: Logo Showcase for VC Lite
author: iThemelandco

sections.description:
Logos Showcase for Visual Composer is the best plugin that allows you to easily display on your website: logos, clients, partners, sponsors, brands, portfolio items
you name it.

Main Features:

  • Responsive Design
  • Easy-to-use with Shortcode Generator With Shortcode Preview
  • Grid Layout
  • Set Background Color For Logos
  • Set Border Style For Logos
  • Set Background Radius For Logos
  • Many Style Option
  • Supports all browsers (including IE7+ ,Chrome, Safari or Firefox)

Upgrade to Pro Version to add features:

  • Grid, List, Carousel Layouts
  • Set Background Gradien And Background Image For Create Unique Testimoial Layouts
  • Popup/Inline Full View Detail
  • Many Logos Hover Effect
  • Add Extra fields Such As Socials, Website, Email, Phone , Short And Full Description
  • Add Logo Image Gallery With Jquery Lightbox In Fornt-end
  • Widget Ready

Pro Demoes:

Logo Showcase Pro Version
Logo Showcase Grid Demo
Logo Showcase Carousel Demo
Logo Showcase List Demo
sections.installation:
Installing from WordPress
Follow the steps below to install inside WordPress:

  • Navigate to Appearance -> Plugins
  • Click Install Plugins and then Upload
  • Navigate to iTehemland-Logo-Showcase-for-VC-Lite.zip on your computer and click Install Now
  • To activate the newly installed plugin navigate to Appearance -> Plugins select the iThemeland Logo Showcase for VC Lite and press Activate
  • After install, activate the plugin.

Installing via FTP Server
Follow the steps below to install via FTP
* Unzip iTehemland-Logo-Showcase-for-VC-Lite.zip to a desired location on your HDD. These extracted files will be uploaded later via FTP
* Connect to your server via FTP
* Navigate to /wp-content/plugins/ on server
* Navigate to location of unzipped iTehemland-Logo-Showcase-for-VC-Lite.zip
* Upload local folder /iTehemland-Logo-Showcase-for-VC-Lite to remote /wp-content/plugins/
* To activate the newly installed plugin navigate to Appearance -> Plugins select the iTehemland Logo Showcase For VC Lite and press Activate
* After install, activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
1. How can I add Logos to the Logo Showcase?

For add logos on back-end, you can use from Visual Composer Page Builder.

2. What data can i add on each Logo ?

Title, logos image, short description, link URL, link target, full description, website, email, tell, logo image gallery, social links (facebook, twitter, instagram, google plus, linked in) each logo

3. Is the logo showcase responsive?

Yes, the logo showcase is responsive and work fine on every devices.

4. Is the logo showcase have documentation?

Yes, you can view it from here .
